alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Montgomery County; Clark; Pike; Southwest Montgomery County Higher Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Clark, northeastern Pike and southeastern Montgomery Counties through 430 PM CDT... At 359 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout over Glenwood, or 18 miles northeast of Murfreesboro. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Landspouts and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Glenwood... Amity... Salem in Pike County... Hopper... Kirby... Welsh... Rosboro... Lodi... Caddo Gap... LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central and Eastern Montgomery County; Clark; Pike; Southwest Montgomery County Higher Elevations
